data.comment: The match is underway at Den Dreef Stadium.
Oud-Heverlee awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 3, Oud-Heverlee have a goal kick.
Can Charleroi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oud-Heverlee's half?
Erik Lambrechts awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Erik Lambrechts awards Charleroi a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Charleroi.
Goal! Charleroi have taken a 0-1 lead courtesy of a header from Dorian Dessoleil.
In the minute 6, That's a fine assist from Ryota Morioka.
Charleroi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Charleroi have been awarded a corner by Erik Lambrechts.
In the minute 11, Charleroi's Dorian Dessoleil gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Oud-Heverlee defender.
Charleroi have been awarded a corner by Erik Lambrechts.
Ball safe as Oud-Heverlee is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Oud-Heverlee in their own half.
Charleroi's Ali Gholizadeh misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Heverlee.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Oud-Heverlee in their own half.
Corner awarded to Oud-Heverlee.
Throw-in for Oud-Heverlee in the half of Charleroi.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Charleroi at Den Dreef Stadium.
Throw-in Oud-Heverlee.
Throw-in for Oud-Heverlee at Den Dreef Stadium.
In the minute 19, Erik Lambrechts signals a free kick to Oud-Heverlee in their own half.
In Heverlee a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Charleroi goal kick.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Oud-Heverlee in their own half.
Goal kick for Oud-Heverlee at Den Dreef Stadium.
Corner awarded to Oud-Heverlee.
In the minute 26, Barnabas Bese (Oud-Heverlee) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Heverlee.
Oud-Heverlee to take a throw-in in Charleroi territory.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Charleroi in their own half.
Ball safe as Charleroi is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Erik Lambrechts signals a Oud-Heverlee throw-in in Charleroi's half.
In the minute 32, Oud-Heverlee awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Erik Lambrechts signals a free kick to Charleroi in their own half.
Goal! Oud-Heverlee go level at 1-1 through Xavier Mercier in Heverlee.
In the minute 34, Kamal Sowah instrumental with a fine assist.
Oud-Heverlee push forward at Den Dreef Stadium and Kamal Sowah gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Charleroi defence.
Erik Lambrechts awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 38, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Oud-Heverlee awarded a free kick in their own half.
Erik Lambrechts signals a free kick to Oud-Heverlee.
In the minute 40, Erik Lambrechts signals a Oud-Heverlee throw-in in Charleroi's half.
Oud-Heverlee are pushing forward but Xavier Mercier's finish is wide of the goal.
Erik Lambrechts awards Charleroi a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Oud-Heverlee awarded a free kick in their own half.
Charleroi's Kayembe is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick Oud-Heverlee.
In the minute 44, The match at Den Dreef Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Kristiyan Malinov, who is down injured.
Attention is being given to Charleroiâ€™s Marco Ilaimaharitra and play has been suspended briefly.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, In Heverlee, Sascha Kotysch (Oud-Heverlee) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Charleroi at Den Dreef Stadium.
Marco Ilaimaharitra is back on the pitch.
In the minute 45, Kristiyan Malinov returns to the field for Oud-Heverlee after picking up a slight injury.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Heverlee.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Charleroi in the half of Oud-Heverlee.
Free kick for Oud-Heverlee in their own half.
In Heverlee a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 48, Charleroi have been awarded a corner by Erik Lambrechts.
Throw-in Charleroi.
Ali Gholizadeh of Charleroi smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 49, Charleroi have been awarded a corner by Erik Lambrechts.
Mamadou Fall heads in to make it 1-2 at Den Dreef Stadium.
Free kick Oud-Heverlee.
In the minute 51, Throw-in Oud-Heverlee.
Ali Gholizadeh (Charleroi) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Kaveh Rezaei's header is off-target for Charleroi.
In the minute 53, Ball goes out of play for a Oud-Heverlee goal kick.
Throw-in for Oud-Heverlee in the half of Charleroi.
Erik Lambrechts awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 58, Ryota Morioka (Charleroi) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Oud-Heverlee have a goal kick.
Erik Lambrechts signals a free kick to Oud-Heverlee in their own half.
In the minute 59, Charleroi's Ali Gholizadeh has been booked in Heverlee.
Kamal Sowah (Oud-Heverlee) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Oud-Heverlee awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to Oud-Heverlee.
Throw-in for Charleroi at Den Dreef Stadium.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Heverlee to check on Kristiyan Malinov, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 64, Mamadou Fall (Charleroi) has been sent off!
Oud-Heverlee's Kristiyan Malinov looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Oud-Heverlee in the half of Charleroi.
Erik Lambrechts signals a throw-in for Oud-Heverlee, close to Charleroi's area.
Marc Brys is making the team's first substitution at Den Dreef Stadium with Jeremy Perbet replacing Yohan Croizet.
Oud-Heverlee are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 66, Sascha Kotysch gets his shot on target but fails to score for Oud-Heverlee.
Oud-Heverlee have a dangerous throw-in.
Charleroi have a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Oud-Heverlee in their own half.
Erik Lambrechts signals a free kick to Charleroi in their own half.
Erik Lambrechts signals a free kick to Oud-Heverlee in their own half.
In the minute 69, Ken Nkuba for Charleroi has been booked by Erik Lambrechts and receives a first yellow card.
Can Oud-Heverlee get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Charleroi's half?
Oud-Heverlee to take a throw-in in Charleroi territory.
In the minute 71, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Maxime Busi for Charleroi who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Oud-Heverlee have been awarded a corner by Erik Lambrechts.
Maxime Busi for Charleroi is back on the field again.
In the minute 74, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Charleroi awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 75, Erik Lambrechts signals a free kick to Charleroi.
Oud-Heverlee make their second substitution with Olivier Myny replacing Yannick Aguemon.
Throw-in for Oud-Heverlee close to the penalty box.
Charleroi are coming forward and Kaveh Rezaei gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 77, Goal kick for Oud-Heverlee at Den Dreef Stadium.
Corner awarded to Oud-Heverlee.
Can Oud-Heverlee get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Charleroi's half?
In the minute 80, Goal! Kaveh Rezaei extends Charleroi's lead to 1-3.
Great play from Ali Gholizadeh to set up the goal.
Daan Vekemans is on a sub for Thibault Vlietinck for Oud-Heverlee.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Charleroi in their own half.
Erik Lambrechts signals a free kick to Oud-Heverlee in their own half.
Free kick Oud-Heverlee.
In the minute 82, At Den Dreef Stadium, Maxime Busi has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Oud-Heverlee drive upfield and Kristiyan Malinov gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Charleroi defender.
In the minute 83, Oud-Heverlee have been awarded a corner by Erik Lambrechts.
Shamar Nicholson is replacing Ali Gholizadeh for the away team.
Oud-Heverlee awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Erik Lambrechts signals a free kick to Charleroi.
In the minute 86, Can Oud-Heverlee capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Charleroi's half?
Erik Lambrechts awards Charleroi a goal kick.
In Heverlee Oud-Heverlee's Olivier Myny is caught offside.
In the minute 89, Ball goes out of play for a Charleroi goal kick.
Throw-in for Charleroi in the half of Oud-Heverlee.
Oud-Heverlee needs to be cautious. Charleroi have an attacking throw-in.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in high up the field for Charleroi in Heverlee.
Can Charleroi capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Oud-Heverlee's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Heverlee.
Free kick for Oud-Heverlee in the half of Charleroi.
In Heverlee a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Full-time! The final score is 1-3.
The away team replace Ryota Morioka with Gaetan Hendrickx.
Ivan Goranov is replacing Kaveh Rezaei for the away team.
Gaetan Hendrickx (Charleroi) has received a first yellow card.
